attributes.action: If a user posts racist abuse auto block & remove from the social media platform.
attributes.additional_details: No one should be able to racially abuse someone and not have any consequences.
attributes.background: Social media users or accounts that post racial abuse or send racist abuse by private message should be flagged/reported and automatically blocked and removed from the social media platform. No warnings. Facebook, Twitter, Instagram....

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for individual social media platforms.

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Require social media platforms’ terms of use to prohibit racism and hate speech
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591760

Require Social media sites review every post/comment before publication
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582820

Produce and enforce a zero-tolerance strategy to end racism on social media
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591720
